56 #ifndef FOXBMS__AFE_H_
57 #define FOXBMS__AFE_H_
58 
59 /*========== Includes =======================================================*/
60 
61 #include "fstd_types.h"
62 
63 #include <stdbool.h>
64 #include <stdint.h>
65 
66 /*========== Macros and Definitions =========================================*/
67 
68 /** Requests for the AFE driver */
69 typedef enum {
70  AFE_START_REQUEST, /*!< */
71  AFE_STOP_REQUEST, /*!< */
72  AFE_NO_REQUEST, /*!< */
73  AFE_REQUEST_E_MAX,
74 } AFE_REQUEST_e;
75 
76 /** Type of I2C transfer over AFE slave */
77 typedef enum {
78  AFE_I2C_TRANSFER_TYPE_READ,
79  AFE_I2C_TRANSFER_TYPE_WRITEREAD,
80  AFE_I2C_TRANSFER_TYPE_READ_SUCCESS,
81  AFE_I2C_TRANSFER_TYPE_READ_FAIL,
82  AFE_I2C_TRANSFER_TYPE_WRITE,
83  AFE_I2C_TRANSFER_TYPE_WRITE_SUCCESS,
84  AFE_I2C_TRANSFER_TYPE_WRITE_FAIL,
85 } AFE_I2C_TRANSFER_TYPE_e;
86 
87 /** Data to transmit on I2C bus over AFE slave */
88 typedef struct {
89  uint8_t module;
90  AFE_I2C_TRANSFER_TYPE_e transferType;
91  uint8_t deviceAddress;
92  uint8_t registerAddress;
93  uint8_t readData[13u];
94  uint8_t readDataLength;
95  uint8_t writeData[13u];
96  uint8_t writeDataLength;
97 } AFE_I2C_QUEUE_s;
98 
99 /** period for open wire measurement */
100 #define AFE_ERROR_OPEN_WIRE_PERIOD_ms (30000u)
101 
102 /*========== Extern Constant and Variable Declarations ======================*/
103 
104 /*========== Extern Function Prototypes =====================================*/
105 /** tick function, this function is called to advance the state machine */
106 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_TriggerIc(void);
107 /** initializer, this function is called in order to initialize the AFE */
108 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_Initialize(void);
109 /** this function should tell the AFE that it should start measuring */
110 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_StartMeasurement(void);
111 /** this function returns whether the first measurement cycle has finished */
112 extern bool AFE_IsFirstMeasurementCycleFinished(void);
113 
114 /**
115  * @brief Checks if the first AFE measurement cycle was made
116  * @return true is the first measurement cycle was made, false
117  * otherwise
118  */
119 extern bool AFE_IsFirstMeasurementCycleFinished(void);
120 
121 /**
122  * @brief Makes the initialization request to the AFE state machine
123  * @return true or false
124  */
125 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_StartMeasurement(void);
126 
127 /**
128  * @brief Makes the request to the AFE state machine to write to the
129  * IO port-expander
130  * @param string string addressed by the request
131  */
132 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_RequestIoWrite(uint8_t string);
133 
134 /**
135  * @brief Makes the request to the AFE state machine to read from the
136  * IO port-expander
137  * @param string string addressed by the request
138  */
139 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_RequestIoRead(uint8_t string);
140 
141 /**
142  * @brief Makes the request to the AFE state machine to read from the
143  * external temperature sensor on slaves
144  * @param string string addressed by the request
145  */
146 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_RequestTemperatureRead(uint8_t string);
147 
148 /**
149  * @brief Makes the request to the AFE state machine to read
150  * balancing feedback from the slaves
151  * @param string string addressed by the request
152  */
153 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_RequestBalancingFeedbackRead(uint8_t string);
154 
155 /**
156  * @brief Makes the request to the AFE state machine to read from the
157  * external EEPROM on slaves
158  * @param string string addressed by the request
159  */
160 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_RequestEepromRead(uint8_t string);
161 
162 /**
163  * @brief Makes the request to the AFE state machine to write to the
164  * external EEPROM on slaves
165  * @param string string addressed by the request
166  */
167 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_RequestEepromWrite(uint8_t string);
168 
169 /**
170  * @brief Makes the request to the AFE state machine to perform
171  * open-wire check
172  * @param string string addressed by the request
173  */
174 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_RequestOpenWireCheck(uint8_t string);
175

177 #ifdef UNITY_UNIT_TEST
178 #endif

180 #endif /* FOXBMS__AFE_H_ */
